scripts.publish:build: npm run build && cd dist/ && npm publish
scripts.publish:cnj: nrm use cnj && npm run build && cd dist/ && npm publish
scripts.publish:ctt: nrm use cnj && npm run build && cd dist/ && npm publish && nrm use ctt
scripts.publish:npm: nrm use cnj && npm run build && cd dist/ && npm publish && nrm use npm
